comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content: Does anyone recognise the tie, the badge or the hat? We'd love to identify the school these lads were cheering so hard for.

comment.author: 32536320@N05
comment._content: They look older than school boys, people tend to look different through different periods of time.

comment.author: 66252982@N05
comment._content:
Brisbane Grammar School, Gregory Terrace  was dark blue, light blue in the design of the ties worn here.
The hat of this epoch (at least 1955) was the felt hat worn here and a magnification of the hat band of the boy centre shows an, I would say, certain partial Grammar logo visible centre on the band.
(The boy on the right is not wearing a blazer and the badge is not the BGS badge - unless an Old Boys badge) Rugby attempted tackle, I imagine . . . Rah Rah Rah!!
